title: ‘Tadej Is Favorite Number One’: Evenepoel Offloads Pressure onto Pogačar as Tantalizing Liège Clash Beckons
content:
Both riders are double winners of Liège-Bastogne-Liège but have never truly gone head to head in race.

Read the full article at ‘Tadej Is Favorite Number One’: Evenepoel Offloads Pressure onto Pogačar as Tantalizing Liège Clash Beckons on Velo.
author: sstokes
